headline.main: U.S. MISSIONARIES HELD BY FOE IN CHINA; Bishop Gilman Among Eight of Episcopal Church Interned

lead_paragraph: The Right Rev. Alfred A. Gilman, Bishop of Hankow, and seven other Episcopal missionaries are interned by the Japanese in Hankow and Wuchang, China, according to a cablegram received yesterday at the office at 281 Fourth Avenue of the Right Rev. Henry St. George Tucker, Presiding Bishop of the Episcopal Church.
abstract: Bishop A A Gilman and 7 U S Episc missionaries interned by Japanese, Hankow and Wuchang, China
